0100001110010000 1010001010110111 1 -> sum: 1110011001001000, cout: 0
1001111001100011 0010110010110100 1 -> sum: 1100101100011000, cout: 0
0100010001001010 0011010010101011 0 -> sum: 0111100011110101, cout: 0
1101001101011001 0011100000111101 1 -> sum: 0000101110010111, cout: 1
1001101001011100 0011110000010001 1 -> sum: 1101011001101110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
